articles.title: Doubling the number of species of hand-standing spotted skunks - Phys.org

articles.title: Biden told Afghan President they needed to 'change perception' of the Taliban's rapid advance - Daily Mail

articles.title: U.S. rail regulator rejects CN's voting trust bid to buy Kansas City Southern - CBC.ca
articles.description: American railway regulator the Surface Transportation Board has blocked Canadian National Railway's bid to buy Kansas City Southern in its current form because the deal would include a voting trust that runs afoul of the rules.
